## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withSecurityScheme() method

Define a component security scheme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withSecurityScheme(name: string, securityScheme: SecuritySchemeObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the security scheme |
|  securityScheme | <code>SecuritySchemeObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the security scheme |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
